mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET OS_CODE=#{os_code} WHERE STORE_CODE=#{store_code} AND REQUEST_SEQ=#{request_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_SEQ,REQUEST_MENU,REQUEST_PRICE,REQUEST_TIME, REQUEST_BANK,REQUEST_ACCOUNT,STORE_CODE,OS_CODE FROM REQUEST WHERE STORE_CODE=#{store_code} AND (OS_CODE=3 OR OS_CODE=0) AND (REQUEST_TIME BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) ORDER BY REQUEST_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST (REQUEST_SEQ, REQUEST_TIME, REQUEST_MENU, REQUEST_PRICE, OS_CODE, STORE_CODE, REQUEST_BANK, REQUEST_ACCOUNT) VALUES(REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{request_menu}, #{request_price}, 1, #{store_code}, #{request_bank}, #{request_account})
